actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill, H.R. 7943, entitled "A bill for the relief of P. S. Seymour-Heath" to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims in accordance with sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 7943, for the relief of P. S. Seymour-Heath, to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims, in accordance with sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill, H.R. 7943, entitled "A bill for the relief of P. S. Seymour-Heath" to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims in accordance with sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code.
